question: What are the names of all British drivers?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname FROM drivers WHERE drivers.nationality = 'British'
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers) WHERE driver.nationality = 'British' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname

question: List all races from 2007 ordered by round
sql: SELECT races.name, races.round FROM races WHERE races.year = 2007 ORDER BY races.round
cypher: MATCH (race:races) WHERE race.year = '2007' RETURN race.name, race.round ORDER BY race.round

question: Show all circuits located in Italy
sql: SELECT circuits.name, circuits.location FROM circuits WHERE circuits.country = 'Italy'
cypher: MATCH (circuit:circuits) WHERE circuit.country = 'Italy' RETURN circuit.name, circuit.location

question: What are the names of German constructors?
sql: SELECT constructors.name FROM constructors WHERE constructors.nationality = 'German'
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors) WHERE constructor.nationality = 'German' RETURN constructor.name

question: List drivers born in the 1970s
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, drivers.dob FROM drivers WHERE drivers.dob >= '1970-01-01 00:00:00' AND drivers.dob < '1980-01-01 00:00:00'
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers) WHERE driver.dob >= date('1970-01-01') AND driver.dob < date('1980-01-01') RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, driver.dob
